title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - What's new with Amazon EBS (STG202)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon EBS 的新功能 (STG202)
abstract: Stay ahead with the cutting-edge capabilities of Amazon's robust block storage solution in Amazon EBS. Join this session for a comprehensive overview of the latest advancements and features in Amazon Elastic Block Store (EBS). Learn about recent performance improvements, cost optimization strategies, new features that enhance data resiliency and storage efficiency, and practical insights for leveraging EBS in modern cloud environments. You will gain a deeper understanding of how to maximize the potential of Amazon EBS for your workloads.
abstract_cn: 通过Amazon EBS这一强大的块存储解决方案的前沿功能保持领先。参加本次会议，全面了解Amazon Elastic Block Store (EBS)的最新进展和特性。了解最近的性能改进、成本优化策略、增强数据弹性和存储效率的新功能，以及在现代云环境中利用EBS的实用见解。您将深入了解如何最大化发挥Amazon EBS在您工作负载中的潜力。
